name: Cold Cave Descent with a Ball
name_original: Cold Cave Descent with a Ball
description:
Cold Cave Descent with a Ball is my entry for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2020. The premise is that there is a ball that has to reach the bottom of the screen. In its path, there are obstacles that the player has to help to clear.

The theme of the jam was "COLD", and I tried to cover it with mechanics involving ice/water/air currents, etc. The looks are tiled pixel art. It is my first approach to Unity in 2D, also to photoshop, and I think it looks pretty solid for what it is. All the graphics are original for this game.

All the sound effects were made with the awesome sfxr. There is no music at all.

The game features 11 levels. Hope you enjoy them. Please leave a comment with your feedback if you wish, it really helps ;)

Thank you for playing this!
